result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:37 AM Defendant Matthew C Skamfer in court.  Attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond in court for Matthew C Skamfer.  Attorney Andrew John Maki appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 22CF86, 22CM61.  

22CF86 PH-State calls Officer Adam Sternweiss, oath administered.  11:02am Direct by the State. 11:07-Cross by Defense. 11:10 Witness excused. 

Argument entered by the State, asks the court to find PC. No argument by Defense.  Court finds PC, will bind over for further proceedings.
Arraignment scheduled for December 22, 2022 at 04:15 pm.
Arraignment on December 22, 2022 at 04:15 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 18, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.

2:09 PM Defendant Matthew C Skamfer in court.  Attorney Andrew John Maki appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond appeared by video for Matthew C Skamfer.  Heard along with 22CF86, 22CM61. Atty Raymond informs they are waiting appointment of a new Judge to these cases. 22CF86 will need to be set for a PH. Set for PH/RH September 27, 2022 @ 11:00AM. ZOOM. Atty Raymond wishes to have any warrants Quashed. So ordered. Adj 2:15PM.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery and Inspection
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery and Inspection
Status conference on August 1, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

1:10 PM Defendant Matthew C Skamfer not in court.  Attorney Andrew John Maki appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 22CF86 and 22CM61. Court will issue PC warrants, $1000.00 in both cases , concurrent.  Will extradite in the CF case, WI application in the CM case. Adj 1:13pm.
Initial appearance on June 21, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
22GF7 into 22CF86

No contact with TH, BC and PN.  Defendant cannot go within 1000 feet of victims home.  DE to make arrangements with SD to retrieve his belongings.   Defendant is not to consume or possess alcohol.  Do not enter premises where alcohol is primary business, any bars taverns or liquor stores or any other establishment where the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.    No possession/consumption or use of illegal or illicit drugs, or any substance intended to use to alter mental state or mood.  Not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  No possession of medications not prescribed to you by a physician.

1:54PM DE appears from RC Jail with PD K Cook.  State appears by DA Barna.  Case will be assigned to a Special Prosecutor per the State.  DE asking the court for a signature bond. 

The court will order a Sign bond, $5000.00, no contact with TH,  BC or PN cannot go within 1000 ft of victims house, DE to make arrangement with SD to retrieve his belongings,   Defendant is not to consume or possess alcohol.  Do not enter premises where alcohol is primary business, any bars taverns or liquor stores or any other establishment where the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.    No possession/consumption or use of illegal or illicit drugs, or any substance intended to use to alter mental state or mood.  Not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  No possession of medications not prescribed to you by a physician.  Adj 2:00PM

2:42PM DE appears from RC Jail via ZOOM,  PD Knaak appears with DE.  ADA Emily Nelson appears for the State.  Per the State they will be searching for a special prosecutor.  Set for February 1, 2022 @ 1:00PM.  Bond will be addressed next week, victims have not been notified for today's hearing.
3:00PM DE appears from Rusk County Jail with PD Cook, State appears by ADA Nelson.  Set for Init App January 25, 2022 @ 1:00PM.  Adj 3:01pm.
Hold for bond hearing.
Any cash bond posted for Defendant shall be used for fines, costs and restitution pursuant to WI STAT 969.13(5). No contact with TLH, her residence or her family.

1:52pm DE appears from RC Jail, PD K Cook appears with DE via ZOOM.  State appears by ADA Nelson. Victim has been contacted per the State. State recommends a  cash bond, asking for a $500.00 cash bond, no contact with TLH, her family and her residence.  Atty Cook argues for a sign bond. DE would like to address the court.  Court will order a $1000.00 cash bond, no contact with TLH, her residence or her family.  Set for Init App January 18, 2022 @ 1:00PM.  Adj 2:02pm.
